c74object.name: j.model
c74object.description: j.model is the central brain in a jamoma model. It parses input, distributes messages to parameters, generates documentation, etc.

objarg.name: component
objarg.digest: Hide j.model's inner services to the minimum (i.e. hides all model/* parameters and messages)
objarg.description: When the "component" argument is specified, j.model restricts its inner services to the minimum (i.e. hides all model/* parameters and messages)

method.name: alias/remove
method.digest: Remove the OSC alias of the model
method.description: Remove the OSC alias of the model

method.name: (mouse)
method.digest: Opens a text editor with all current values of all parameters of the model
method.description: Opens a text editor with all current values of all parameters of the model

method.name: dump
method.digest: Dump all attributes' values out the rightmost outlet

method.name: init
method.description: Initialize this model. This message is implemented as a j.message embedded in the j.model object

method.name: model/edit
method.digest: Opens a text editor with all current values of all parameters of the model

attribute.name: alias
attribute.digest: Provide the model with an OSC alias. This can be used for future remote OSC communication to the model
attribute.description: Provide the model with an OSC alias. This can be used for future remote OSC communication to the model

attribute.name: description
attribute.digest: A textual description of the model for auto-documentation purposes
attribute.description: A textual description of the model for auto-documentation purposes

attribute.name: priority
attribute.digest: The priority of the model - used for preset and cue management
attribute.description: The priority of the model - used for preset and cue management

attribute.name: tag
attribute.digest: Arbitrary list of tags that can be further used by several services such as j.namespace
attribute.description: Arbitrary list of tags that can be further used by several services such as j.namespace
